name: deck.gl
description: A suite of 3D-enabled data visualization overlays, suitable for react-map-gl

scripts.build: npm run build-dist && npm run build-script
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-clean && npm run build-src && npm run build-shaderlib
scripts.build-script: browserify src/bundle.js -t babelify -t brfs-babel | uglifyjs > dist/deckgl.min.js
scripts.build-watch: npm run build-clean && npm run build-src-watch && npm run build-shaderlib-watch
scripts.demo-start: npm run demo-build-copy && budo demo/src/javascripts/main.js:main.min.js --dir dist-demo/ --open -- -t babelify -t sassify -t brfs-babel
scripts.demo-build: npm run demo-build-clean && npm run demo-build-copy && npm run demo-build-script
scripts.demo-build-copy: mkdir -p dist-demo/docs && cp -R demo/src/static/* dist-demo/ && cp -R docs dist-demo
scripts.demo-build-script: NODE_ENV=production browserify demo/src/javascripts/main.js -o -t babelify -t sassify -t brfs-babel | uglifyjs > dist-demo/main.min.js
scripts.demo-gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix dist-demo origin gh-pages
scripts.demo-gh-pages-force: git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist-demo master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.demo-publish: npm run build && npm run demo-build && git add dist-demo -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run demo-gh-pages
scripts.demo-publish-force: npm run build && npm run demo-build && git add dist-demo -f && git commit -m 'UPDATE DOCS' --no-verify && npm run demo-gh-pages-force
scripts.mypublish: npm run build && npm run test-fast && npm publish
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-dist && npm run test-headless
scripts.test-fast: npm run lint && npm run test-headless
scripts.test-shader: npm run build-dist && budo src/test/shader.js:build/test-bundle.js --dir test --live --open --port 3001 --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,scss,js,glsl}' -- -t babelify -t brfs-babel
scripts.profile-disc: browserify src/bundle.js --full-paths -t babelify -t brfs-babel | uglifyjs | discify --open
scripts.start: npm run build-watch && budo example/main.js:example/bundle.js --live --open --port 3000 --css example/main.css --title 'deck.gl' --watch-glob '**/*.{html,css,js,glsl}' -- -t brfs-babel -t babelify -t envify
